pageTitle: Sorry, we cannot authorise you to use this service - error 403 - Send an SR1 - GOV.UK
h1: Sorry, we cannot authorise you to use this service - error 403
p1: Only specific job roles are authorised to complete an SR1 form.

ul.li5: senior specialist nurse (such as a clinical nurse specialist, advanced nurse practitioner or similar)

p2: Your job role is checked against the job role on your NHS smartcard. If you should have access to this service, make sure your smartcard is correct. If it’s wrong, your IT support team will be able to help.
p3: If you do not have access to the NHS National Service Desk, you can email them at ssd.nationalservicedesk@nhs.net or call them on 0300 303 5035.
h2: What can you do if the problem continues
p4: You can complete PDF versions of the SR1 and the fee claim forms online. They do not need to be signed, but you’ll need to return them to us from a secure email address. Any email that does not come from a secure email address will be automatically deleted.

section2.p2: Send the request for a PDF version of the SR1 form, and fee claim form if needed, from your secure email address to form.e-sr1@dwp.gov.uk. Please include your:

p5: Do not encrypt any part of this email.

ul3.li1: give the SR1 form to the person who asked you for it and return the fee form separately to us, or
ul3.li2: send the completed SR1 form and fee form to us

p6: When returning SR1 forms, please use a separate envelope for each patient. Do not staple forms together.
